meanings.definition: A tool used to remove lint from clothing.
meanings.sent1: I used a linter to clean the lint off my favorite sweater.
meanings.sent2: The linter quickly removed all the lint from the fabric.
meanings.sent3: The linter decided to go on strike, tired of always cleaning up after us.
meanings.sent4: Her fingers worked like a linter, meticulously picking out every piece of lint.
meanings.sent5: The linter hummed happily as it made the sweater look brand new.

meanings.definition: A program that analyzes source code to flag potential errors.
meanings.sent1: The linter highlighted the errors in the code for easy fixing.
meanings.sent2: Developers rely on a linter to catch mistakes in their programming.
meanings.sent3: The linter program joked that it had a 'lintervention' with the code.
meanings.sent4: The linter acted like a vigilant guard, catching any bugs trying to sneak in.
meanings.sent5: Using the linter felt like having a second pair of eyes to spot errors.
